name: LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 Program
summary: Learn about .EV3P files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 provides various tools for building and controlling LEGO EV3 robots. The software also allows you to configure the robots' functionality through programs stored in the EV3P files.

NOTE: To create the EV3P program, click the "+" tab at the top left of the Project screen in the application, under the EV3 Project file tab, and next to the wrench icon. Additionally, you can see a list of your EV3P program files when you click the wrench icon.

instructions: You can open EV3P files with the LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 (Home and Education versions) in Windows or macOS. For example, to open an EV3P file:
Click the wrench icon in the top-left of the Project screen in the application.
Select Import in the bottom of the window.
Navigate to your EV3S (the exported version of the EV3P file) file, select it, and click Open.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
